subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Willie Randolph was handed a two-year contract extension, with a club option for a third year, that assures he will remain manager of the Mets through at least the 2009 season.
snippet: Willie Randolph was handed a two-year contract extension, with a club option for a third year, that assures he will remain manager of the Mets through at least the 2009 season.
